--28107024-11736-1374940001=:5496
Content-Type: TEXT/PLAIN; format=flowed; charset=ISO-8859-15
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8BIT


Hello,

We would like to define a scope in a Heritrix 1.14 job in a way that URIs 
which have been accepted by a TransclusionDecideRule should only be 
collected if their Content-Type is not text/html.

That means, for instance, that URIs as a result of an extraction from 
JavaScript should be accepted if their contents is an image, css or any 
other resource that might be necessary to build up the web page. If, 
however, a URI extracted from JavaScript points to an ordinary HTML page, 
it should be rejected.

Does anybody have an idea how to achieve this?

Thanks in advance,
   Bert
